description: This file contains mock service implementations for a Flutter stock trading application, providing fake data for stocks, portfolios, lessons, alerts, and other related functionalities.

classes.name: MockServices
classes.description: A static class providing mock data for stocks, portfolios, lessons, alerts, and other financial simulation functionalities.

methods.name: topMovers
methods.description: Generates a list of top moving stocks with randomized changes, signals, and scores.

methods.name: portfolio
methods.description: Creates a mock portfolio summary with computed value, daily and total P&L, and holdings.

methods.name: lessons
methods.description: Returns a list of predefined educational lessons related to finance topics.

methods.name: alerts
methods.description: Provides a list of simulated alert items for user notifications.

methods.name: askAI
methods.description: Simulates an asynchronous AI response to a question about a stock symbol.

methods.name: linkPlaid
methods.description: Simulates linking a Plaid account asynchronously, always returning true.

methods.name: linkBroker
methods.description: Simulates linking a broker account asynchronously, returning true if the name is non-empty.

methods.name: communityLeaderboard
methods.description: Generates a list of community leaderboard entries with user names and scores.

methods.name: simulateWealth
methods.description: Performs a simple simulation of wealth growth over time with expected return and volatility, returning final value and series data.

methods.name: passiveIncome
methods.description: Calculates passive income breakdowns based on invested amount and yield percentage.

methods.name: peers
methods.description: Returns a list of peer stocks similar to a given symbol.
